title: By the Grace of Todd
description: Perfect for fans of Andrew Clements , Dan Gutman , and The Borrowers , By the Grace of Todd is the laugh-out-loud answer to what happens if you leave dirty laundry on the floor . . . and don’t follow your mother’s instructions to clean your room.Twelve-year-old Todd has created life through sheer grossness.How did he become an accidental god?Ingredient A worn athletic sockIngredient Dirt from the Great and Powerful Todd himself Leave under bed for months. Do not clean room. 50 ant-sized ToddliansBUT WATCH OUT! When school bully Max Loving puts the future of the tiny Toddlians in jeopardy, Todd will have to do everything in his power to save the race his very negligence created.
author: Louise Galveston
